name: Custom Resources
author: Fineswap

sections.description:
This plugin will make developers and site builders (hopefully very) happy.

It enables site administrators to supply additional styles or/and scripts to
be loaded alongside the theme’s resources. It will work regardless which
theme the site is running, which makes it brilliant for adding custom
programming and content blocks.

Styles and scripts can be either entered manually or loaded from
external URL’s.

Brought to you by Fineswap Team.
sections.installation:
1. Download a copy of the plugin from wordpress.org/plugins.
  2. Extract the files from the compressed file; this will create a directory.
  3. Upload the extracted directory to your website’s plugins directory (wp-content/plugins/ is the default).
  4. Log into your WordPress backend console.
  5. Locate and activate the plugin from the Plugins page.
  6. All options are under Settings > Custom Resources page.
  7. Consider subscribing to Fineswap’s newsletter to receive updates and news from us.
sections.faq:
Q. Can you implement a feature that I need?

A. Maybe… Please contact us and tell us about it.

short_description: Easily load additional styles and scripts (for both front and backend pages). Works by direct inline embedding or by using URL's.

screenshots.caption: Showing TEXTAREA controls to enter custom styles and scripts.
Showing CHECKBOX controls to control where should styles and/or scripts load.
